description:
Outdoor adventures begin and end with this pant. It's tough, abrasion resistant, and stacked with performance features that have your back no matter how hard you push your limits. And for those who love the comfort of an elastic waist, this men's pant is your new best friend.

Made with ReZion™, the Earth-friendly evolution of our bestselling performance fabric, you can adventure confidently knowing there are over two decades of tried and trusted durability backing you up.
name: Prana Stretch Zion E-Waist Pants II, 30" Inseam - Mens
